title: Dehiwala - Brand new 2 BR Blue Ocean luxury apartment for sale
details:
Brand new Luxury 2 BR apartment for sale . Blue Ocean apartment at De Alwis Place, Dehiwala is comprised into an 8-storey, 28-unit condominium with a unique appearance. The completion of this project is by May/2018 . This apartment comprises two bedroom unit, 1,100 sqft in 1st floor, including a spacious living room, pantry and dining room that guarantee a comfortable living for its occupants.

The apartment is designed with modern architecture and interior amenities to suit the latest styles for a luxury living in a cosmopolitan setting. The rooms are designed to deliver sophistication and elegance. The atmosphere of tranquility and relaxation is enhanced by the pastel tiled floors. The serenity of the rooftop overlooking the sea and city view adds to the appeal of these apartments.
